original_text: God has given you a group of believers to take care of them. Do not try to rule over them with power. Instead, show them how to live in a good way, so that they can copy you.
korean_text: 맡은 자들에게 주장하는 자세를 하지 말고 양 무리의 본이 되라

sentences.original_text: God has given you a group of believers
Do not try to rule over them with power
Instead, show them how to live in a good way
sentences.korean_translation: 대신, 좋은 방식으로 사는 법을 그들에게 보여주세요

sentences.original_text: so that they can copy you
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 당신을 따라 할 수 있도록
